channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Management Center (MC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Management Center (MC)

item.title: CVE-2019-9697|2024-08-04T21:54:45.139Z -- symantec%20corporation -- management%20center%20%28mc%29
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Management Center (MC) REST API 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2 prior to 2.2.2.1 allows a malicious authenticated user to obtain passwords for external backup and CPL policy import servers that they might not otherwise be authorized to access.
